common.holidayWarning: This day is a public holiday. Occupancy may differ from a regular day.

todayTomorrow.title: Today and Tomorrow
todayTomorrow.description: This heatmap displays current occupancy, number of opened lanes and historical average occupancy for today and tomorrow, helping you plan your visit.

overall.title: Average Occupancy
overall.description: This heatmap shows the average pool occupancy over recent weeks. It displays typical occupancy patterns for each day of the week taking into account closed lanes.

occupancy.title: Weekly Occupancy Heatmap
occupancy.description: This heatmap shows how full the pool is relative to its maximum capacity. The maximum varies throughout the day as lanes may be reserved for specific activities.

raw.title: Weekly Raw Occupancy
raw.description: This heatmap shows the actual (min-max) number of people in the pool for each hour, helping you visualize the raw occupancy numbers throughout the week.
